definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
floating clouds, morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral nature of human existence

sentences.english: White cloud blue crystal, evening mans the sunset west Yang.
sentences.chinese: 白芒浮雲藍晶瑩，黃昏之日落西陽。

sentences.english: Dawn clouds frame the East Lamma Channel and Hong Kong Island.
sentences.chinese: 時值破曉，東博寮海峽和香港島上浮雲飄蕩。

sentences.english: Fame is fleeting in the traditional sense.
sentences.chinese: 在傳統的意識中，名聲就是浮雲。

sentences.english: He that gathereth treasures by a lying tongue, is vain and foolish, and shall stumble upon the snares of death.
sentences.chinese: 以謊言僞語騙得的財寶，是浮雲輕煙，死亡的羅網。

sentences.english: Absorbed in painting, you know not old age is coming; indeed, to me wealth and rank are like clouds scudding.
sentences.chinese: 丹青不知老將近，富貴於我如浮雲。

sentences.english: Who Deserted in the ancient shore, wild water clouds everywhere worry.
sentences.chinese: 荒村古岸誰家在，野水浮雲處處愁。

sentences.english: One small cloud floats over the island, casting its shadow toward the northwest.
sentences.chinese: 小島上空漂浮着小塊浮雲，小島西北部有陰影。

sentences.english: Under the spuermoon, everything is but a floating cloud.
sentences.chinese: 超級月亮之下，神馬都是浮雲。

sentences.english: And at every drifting cloud that went With sails of silver by.
sentences.chinese: 眼見每片飄過的浮雲展現出銀帆般的丰韻。

sentences.english: While barred clouds bloom the soft-dying day.
sentences.chinese: 當片片浮雲把緩緩將逝的一天照映。

sentences.english: The floating clouds, is only the slave of wind, although it brings thunder and lightning.
sentences.chinese: 儘管浮雲有時狹電攜雷，但它不過是風的奴隸。

sentences.english: Wordsworth wandered lonely as a cloud when walking with his sister.
sentences.chinese: 華茲華斯於其姊同行時就如同浮雲獨行。

sentences.english: Friends come in do not make commentary oh. What is cloud, you'll see.
sentences.chinese: 友友進來不要亂評哦。神馬就是浮雲，你懂的？

sentences.english: Do not cloud one, the water decade.
sentences.chinese: 浮雲一別後，流水十年間。

sentences.english: I watched the clouds in the sky, not a word to say.
sentences.chinese: 我望着窗外大團大團的浮雲，沒有說話。

definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
